            Bio
            I am a Masters student in the DACSS program at the University of Massachusetts, Amherst; anticipated graduation Summer 2022. The day job is Senior Systems and Analytics Engineer at the Gandara Center in West Springfield, MA.
            This site contains my academic blog with ruminations on computational social science, my own learning processes and discoveries, and related technical topics and snippets.
            
            
            Education
            Hampshire College | Amherst, MA
            BA, Social Science, 1990-3
            University of Massachusetts, Amherst | Amherst, MA
            M.S, Data Analytics and Computational Social Science | Anticipated graduation summer 2022
            
            
            Experience
            Gandara Center | Senior Systems and Analytics Engineer / CIO / IT Director | 2005 - Present
            Silicon Goblin Technologies | Owner / Programmer | 1999 - 2015
            National Center on Adult Literacy, University of Pennsylvania Graduate School of Education | Systems Programmer | 1997-1999
            Holyoke Public Schools | Literacy and GED Instructor | 1994-1997
            Unicom, Inc. | Systems Programmer and Technical Writer | 1983-1997
            
            
            Interests
            Data analytics and statistics
            Programming languages
            The state of the world
            Drawing, painting, guitar, motorcycles, baking, gaming
